text: The Muslim Patrol was a gang of British Muslims who attempted to establish Sharia law in parts of the United Kingdom. The gang filmed their activities and posted them on YouTube. They attacked people who had alcohol or drugs, prostitutes, and people who they thought were gay or not wearing enough clothes.Muslim patrols" target drinkers and gays in London". The Observers. Five men were arrested as part of an investigation into the gang.UK: Muslim patrols hit London streets again retrieved 8 May 2013 ==References== Category:Gangs Category:Islamic organizations Category:British criminals
